dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist, Net Enforcers, Inc. on behalf of Crutchfield Corporatio
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Monday, April 04, 2005 3:13 PM
To: Crutchfield.Management@netenforcers.com
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist, Net Enforcers, Inc. on behalf of
Crutchfield Corporation (www.sotechsystems.com)]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.


- -------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] Cease & Desist, Net Enforcers,        Inc. on behalf of
Crutchfield Corporation (www.sotechsystems.com)
Date: Mon, 4 Apr 2005 15:17:59 -0400
From: Net Enforcers - Crutchfield Management Team
<Crutchfield.Management@netenforcers.com>
To: <support@sotechsystems.com>
CC: abuse@theplanet.com



  _____



4/4/2005



Re: Violation of Crutchfield New Media Copyright





Dear Sir/Madam:



            It has come to our attention that you are using copyrighted text
and/or images from our web site, Crutchfield.com.  We have reviewed your
site (www.sotechsystems.com) and have made copies that show your verbatim
copying of large portions of our web site including, but not limited to,



http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=BOSSZJWG46

http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=INFGGZR019

http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=PANNQYGW16

http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=PIOLIXEQ46

http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=PIOP55GP14

http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=PIOPN75814

http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=SONQX3LO11

 <http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=SONT1DQ515>
http://www.sotechsystems.com/cube/view_product.php?product=SONT1DQ515



            As a web site owner that has copyrighted its own web site, I am
convinced that Sotech Systems is aware of how concerned we are by this use
of our copyrighted work.  Each and every page of our web site has a clearly
marked copyright notice.  We are hereby placing Sotech Systems on notice
that this work is a valuable asset of Crutchfield New Media and that we
intend to vigorously enforce our copyrights.  Crutchfield New Media has
spent vast sums of money in creating this site and has no intention of
allowing our intellectual property to be used in violation of state and
federal copyright laws.



            I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am
an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of certain intellectual
property rights, said owner being named [Crutchfield New Media, LLC] ("IP
Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the listings or materials listed
herein are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent, or the law and
therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state, federal, or
United States law.
We are hereby requesting that you discontinue the use of all Crutchfield New
Media copyrighted material immediately.  If the offending material is not
removed we will have no choice but to pursue appropriate legal action
against you.



Note that we are sending a copy of this letter to your internet service
provider, ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. to place them on legal
notice that you are violating our intellectual property rights and that by
allowing this material to remain posted it is contributing to the
infringement of our rights under federal and state laws.



            If you have any questions on this matter you may contact me at
1-434-817-1000, extension 2452.





Sincerely,





Ronald Solomon

In House Counsel

Crutchfield Corporation



- --
- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
THe Planet Internet Services, LLC
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.1 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Thunderbird - http://enigmail.mozdev.org

iD8DBQFCUZ/MvK/XpJs6oyURAk9aAJ49HKUO3Vs72sp/yG/sOoEBG1N4XgCdEPzk
NX75v9k7UpkXDAMvuNb2jnw=
=wOot
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
